news_header: Liam Payne, former One Direction star, died at 31 in Argentina after falling from a hotel balcony.
news_text: Liam Payne, the 31-year-old ex-member of One Direction, tragically died in Buenos Aires, Argentina, after falling from the third floor of a hotel. Police found his body following reports of an aggressive individual possibly under the influence of drugs and alcohol. An investigation is underway, and an autopsy is planned. Payne had recently attended a concert by his former bandmate Niall Horan. Fans gathered outside the hotel to pay their respects, expressing disbelief and sorrow over his sudden passing. Tributes from fellow musicians and friends highlighted his kind nature and the impact of his loss on his family and fans. Payne rose to fame with One Direction, which formed on The X Factor in 2010, and later enjoyed a solo career. He is survived by his son, Bear.
